statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
When Teddy was a child , he was always thinking about some simple math problems ,such as “What it’s 1 cup of water plus 1 pile of dough ..” , “100 yuan buy 100 pig” .etc..

One day Teddy met a old man in his dream , in that dream the man whose name was“RuLai” gave Teddy a problem :

Given an N , can you calculate how many ways to write N as i * j + i + j (0 < i <= j) ?

Teddy found the answer when N was less than 10…but if N get bigger , he found it was too difficult for him to solve.
Well , you clever ACMers ,could you help little Teddy to solve this problem and let him have a good dream ?

statement.title: Input
statement.content: The first line contain a T(T <= 2000) . followed by T lines ,each line contain an integer N (0<=N <= 10<sup>10</sup>).

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case, output the number of ways in one line.
